Title: A Stinking Fairytale
Actors: Zarko Lausevic, Jelena Djokic, Petar Bozovic, Milos Vlalukin
Plot: Moma is a hobo and suffers from depression. Ema is a hobo and had been treated for alcoholism. Moma lives in the abandoned factory premises. Ema lives in the shaft. Moma liked Ema at first sight. Ema liked Moma at second sight.
